text:
Beekeeper http://beekeeper.ch @ Zurich, Switzerland

# Looking for Software Engineers

Beekeeper is a fast growing Software-as-a-Service company disrupting the way 2 billion people working “out in the field” communicate within their companies. Are you eager to shape the future of traditional industries like hospitality, retail, manufacturing or transportation?

We are looking for Software Engineers that are eager to solve hard problems on Android, iOS, Web and backend development. We are active in both the European and US market.

More on our open positions: http://beekeeper.ch/company#jobs Android, iOS, API, Web, Mobile, 10x
